item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am a Computer Science & Engineering student from TurkeyðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡·. Throughout my high school years I was interested in programming and have participated in robotics competitions such as First Lego League, First Robotics Competition and Teknofest. These experiences led me to pursuing a degree in Computer Science & Engineering. In this blog, I am sharing my progress in order to motivate and track myself. Contents might seem super basic to some people, maybe they are ðŸ™‚.
